descriptionHtml:
Cyren Logic App Ingestion uses Logic Apps with managed identity to poll Cyren's IP Reputation and Malware URLs feeds and ingest threat indicators into Microsoft Sentinel via the Logs Ingestion API.

This solution includes:

  • Playbooks: Two Logic Apps for Cyren IP Reputation and Malware URLs feeds

Key Features:

  • Managed identity authentication to Azure Monitor
  • Dual-feed ingestion (IP Reputation + Malware URLs)
  • Configurable polling interval
